'../../Project/Images//Web project/wireframes.png' import Step_1 from '../../Project/Images/Step_1.svg' const ArivalWeb = () => { return (
, , ]} bottomBlock={[ , ]} />, ]} /> , Context: When I joined the company, the prior web application version had recently been launched for testing and was in preparation for a wider release in a few months. The CEOs were dissatisfied with the app’s quality, and the customer experience team received a lot of negative feedback from the test users. } />, Initial challenges: The primary challenge was clarifying and communicating the need for a full redesign. } />, , In this context, I seized the opportunity to take initiative,{' '} proactively leading a comprehensive revamp project {' '} with a proper design thinking process and{' '} establishing a UX strategy for the product. } />, My role: 80% of the time I worked as the solo designer on this project. In the final month, a second designer joined me to accelerate the development preparations, which included creating some of the UI kit components and additional scenarios. I supervised and managed both these tasks. } />, Project goals: A full-scale application revamp. New visual style. New UI kit. } />, ]} bottomBlock={[]} /> , ]} bottomBlock={[ , ]} /> , ]} textElementType="h2" text="Stakeholders interviews " />, , , , , , , ]} bottomBlock={[]} /> , ]} textElementType="h2" text="App mind map " />, , ]} bottomBlock={[ , ]} /> , ]} textElementType="h3" text="Heuristic evaluation" />, , Illogical information architecture: The app structure was inconvenient at all levels. Dashboard, feature sections, entry points, as well as the organization of blocks, cards, and their content, did not consider the real value of the provided information for the user. Some important features and screens were difficult to find, and the information presented was not always clear. } />, Unscalable structure: Adding new features caused challenges for the design and development teams, resulting in inefficient use of resources. As a result, the final location of features was often illogical or hard to find. } />, High cognitive load: Regarding UX many flows and scenarios were overloaded and unclear. } />, Unsophisticated user interface: There were numerous inconsistencies, insufficient color contrast, and small, hard-to-read fonts. Overall, the design gave the impression of a draft rather than a finished product. } />, ]} bottomBlock={[]} /> , ]} textElementType="h3" text="User research" />, I initiated my research by conducting a{' '} competitive analysis to understand the approaches of the similar fintech applications. I also wanted to identify functional and usability gaps by exploring alternative solutions. } />, Then I partnered with a UX researcher to conduct extensive primary research. Discovery interviews provided valuable insights into our target users' pain points, preferences, and desired features. Lastly,{' '} usability testing helped identify specific issues within the current solution. } />, ]} bottomBlock={[]} /> , ]} /> , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , ]} bottomBlock={[ , ]} /> , ]} textElementType="h3" text="Ideation & Prototypes " />, , , , , , ]} bottomBlock={[ , ]} /> , , , ]} bottomBlock={[ , ]} /> , , , ]} bottomBlock={[]} /> , , ]} bottomBlock={[]} /> , ]} textElementType="h3" text="New solution validation " />, , ]} bottomBlock={[]} /> , ]} textElementType="h3" text="Polishing & Handoff " />, , , , , ]} bottomBlock={[]} /> , , , , , , , , , , , ]} bottomBlock={ [ // , ] } />
) } export default ArivalWeb
